name: The Remains of Gary Hendrix
description:
An adventure game for the $104 game jam. About Jimmy Hendrix (look, I didn't know that was a guitarist at the time) trying to prove that his brother Gary is alive. That's really all I have to say. 

TIPS:

  1. Use doors to go through them.
  2. Look at objects for hints.
  3. Try everything.

NOTE:

The credits are not entirely accurate. in(Finn)ite did make some of the art, but I kind of didn't include it in the game because it was hard to color in.
